Metadata.title: Welcome to Tuinmaximaal
Metadata.description: Tuinmaximaal offers the lowest price guarantee on verandas and glass sliding doors. Order your garden structure as an easy-to-assemble kit.
Metadata.keywords: veranda, glass sliding doors, garden veranda, aluminium veranda, DIY veranda kit, glass garden room, sliding glass wall, patio cover, lowest price guarantee

a11y.heroImageAlt: Modern veranda with matte black aluminium frame and glass sliding doors by Tuinmaximaal.

Metadata.title: Page not found

NotFound.heading: Oops! Page not found.
NotFound.description: We can't find the page you're looking for. But don't worry, we're happy to help you!

Metadata.description: Use our measuring instructions tool for accurately measuring your Gumax® glass sliding doors

Common.depthVerandaTooltip: Select the depth of your veranda.
Common.slopeTooltip: Enter the overflow of your terrace in millimeters. This is the height difference across your terrace.
Common.passageHeightResult: The calculated passage height is: {result} mm.
Common.rangeSuccess: This falls {within} the passage height range of: {min} - {max} mm.
Common.rangeError: This falls {outside} the passage height range of Tuinmaximaal.

WallProfileHeight.label: Wall profile height from ground (0° overflow)
WallProfileHeight.tooltip: Enter the height of the wall profile (in millimeters). This is the height at which the wall profile is mounted to the wall. The height must be between {min} mm and {max} mm.

validationErrors.min: The height must be at least {min} mm
validationErrors.max: The height may not exceed {max} mm

HeightLowerGutter.label: Height of gutter bottom from ground (0° overflow)
HeightLowerGutter.tooltip: Enter the height from the ground to the flat underside of the gutter (in millimeters). The height must be between {min} mm and {max} mm.

validationErrors.min: The height must be at least {min} mm
validationErrors.max: The height may not exceed {max} mm
